review: Works as advertised, so a solid 3 stars. Flipping through menus is speedy. It did take me a little bit to grasp the interface as I also own/use a Roku 2 XD. The interface confusion is caused by amazon content being accessed though main menu screens while other content can only be accessed once you start an app. When you look at your recent activity you will see Amazon videos you have watched plus other apps.I do not use the supplied power adapter (Cord is too short to reach the surge protector on the other side of entertainment center. Problem is my setup; not cord length) When I power off my TV the Fire stick powers down too. This is a slight annoyance because I have to restart Netflix to get back to what I was watching the night before.Waiting for iOS app and the ability to screen share from any device, including PC. I will add/remove stars accordingly if/when these features are added.
author: Joe McVicker
